title: Aleem Khan grieved over demise of Agha Siraj
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): Federal Minister for Communications and President of the Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party, Abdul Aleem Khan, on Wednesday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of former Speaker of the Sindh Assembly, Agha Siraj Durrani.
In his condolence message, Federal Minister Abdul Aleem Khan said that Agha Siraj Durrani was a towering and dignified figure in Sindh’s political landscape who rendered valuable services for public welfare and the promotion of democratic values.
He stated that the late leader’s dedication to politics and his tireless efforts for the betterment of the people will always be remembered.
President Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party, Abdul Aleem Khan extended heartfelt sympathy and condolences to the bereaved family and colleagues of the deceased, praying that may Allah Almighty grant Agha Siraj Durrani an exalted place in His Mercy and give patience and strength to the family to bear this loss with fortitude.
